on reading compounds: 灌漑農業【カンガイノウギョウ】irrigation farming
湯灌【ユカン】washing a corpse for burial
kun reading compounds: 注ぐ【そそぐ】to pour (into), to sprinkle on (from above), to water (e.g. plants), to pour onto, to spray, to shed (tears), to concentrate one's energy (strength, attention, etc.) on, to devote to, to fix (one's eyes) on, to flow into (e.g. of a river), to run into, to drain into, to fall (of rain, snow), to pour down
